description: Started as a Junior Developer working on basic web applications and learning the foundations of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Promoted to Front-End Engineer, leading small projects, implementing responsive design using Bootstrap, and collaborating with UI/UX teams.
Worked as a Full Stack Developer building scalable web apps with React and Node.js, managing APIs, and deploying solutions to AWS.
Currently serving as a Senior Engineer focusing on cloud architecture, automation, and mentoring junior developers.
